mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Clarysville Hospital. Civil War Records of Samuel West, Physician
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Smith, Abraham A.
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Upshire Co., VA [Upshur County, West Virginia]
Buchannan, Uphsire Co., Virginia [Buckhannon, Upshur County, West Virginia]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Smith, Abraham A. Patient Age: 28. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Gun shot wound of brachial region arterior middle 3rd with slight fracture of humerus. Statement of patient-says it was done by Shell but the probability is it was done by bullet & not extracted. Examined but not found. . Location Wounded: In act[ion] at Winchester, Va. Date Wounded: 1864/07/20. Nature of Wound: Supposed to be a bullet. Result: Discharged from service on surgeons certificate .
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Smith, Abraham A.

Gun shot wound of brachial region arterior middle 3rd with slight fracture of humerus. Statement of patient-says it was done by Shell but the probability is it was done by bullet & not extracted. Examined but not found.
